description:
Kanon and her sister, Kimika, arrive at a tea salon, where they run into Yuzuru enjoying his cup of tea. Both him and Kimika have come looking for the legendary tea that the cafe`s owner, Ms. Otsuru, prepares: the Miracle Diamond. However, a pair of robbers show up out of nowhere, making those inside the cafe panic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Drastic Transformation! Yuzuru`s True Form?
Kururi to Henshin! Yuzuru Shin no Sugata
くるりと変身! ユヅル真の姿?
